TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaElement extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaParticle

summary.span: 按 WWW 联合会 (W3C) 指定的方式显示 来自 XML 架构的元素。

span.span: Represents the element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

summary.span: 此类是所有微粒类型的基类，用于描述 XML 文档中的元素。

span.span: This class is the base class for all particle types and is used to describe an element in an XML document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > - 不要使用来自未知或不受信任的源或位置的架构。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations. 执行此操作将影响你的代码的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. > - XML 架构 （包括内联架构） 是本质上是容易受到拒绝服务攻击;不接受不受信任的方案中。XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios. > - 架构验证错误消息和异常可能会公开的内容模型的架构文件的 URI 路径的敏感信息。Schema validation error messages and exceptions may expose sensitive information about the content model or URI paths to the schema file. 请注意不公开此信息向不受信任调用方。Be careful not to expose this information to untrusted callers. ## Examples 下面的示例创建`element`元素。The following example creates the `element` element. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaElement Example/CPP/element.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaElement Example/CS/element.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSchemaElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaElement Example/VB/element.vb#1)] 下面的 XML 文件用于前面的代码示例。The following XML file is used for the preceding code example. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlSchemaElement Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaElement Example/XML/example.xsd#2)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 派生。

span.span: Gets or sets a derivation.

value.span: 用于阻止类型派生的属性。

span.span: The attribute used to block a type derivation.
Default value is .
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以包含以下值：This attribute can contain the following values: |EnumEnum|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`None`|使用定义的派生限制`BlockDefault`架构，如果它存在的属性。Use the derivation restriction defined by the `BlockDefault` property of the schema, if it exists.| |`Empty`|有此元素的替换不受限制。There are no restrictions on replacements of this element.| |`Substitution`|此元素不能被替换为通过替换派生类型。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Substitution.| |`Extension`|此元素不能被替换为通过扩展派生类型。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| |`Restriction`|此元素不能被替换为通过限制派生类型。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| |`All`|`#all`。`#all`. 此元素不能被替换为任何类型而不考虑派生方法。This element cannot be replaced by any type regardless of derivation method.| 此属性不会阻止派生，但可防止派生替换实例中的类型。This property does not prevent derivation, but prevents derivation from replacing the type in an instance. 不支持 list 和 union 值`block`属性。List and union values are not supported for the `block` property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BlockResolved As XmlSchemaDerivationMethod

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取 属性的编译后值。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation value of the property.
The post-compilation value of the property.

value.span: 默认为 元素中的 值。

span.span: The default is the value on the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该值指示在实例文档中使用 `xsi:type` 时如何强制类型。This value indicates how the type is enforced when `xsi:type` is used in the instance document. 例如，如果限制了该值，则可以使用的特定定义的类型，不是类型派生通过限制从特定的已定义类型。For example, if the value is restricted, only the specific defined type can be used, not types derived by restriction from the specific defined type. 此属性可以包含下表中显示的值。This property can contain the values shown in the following table. 默认值为 `None`。The default is `None`. 此属性上不允许列表和联合派生方法。List and union derivation methods are not allowed on this property. |EnumEnum|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`Empty`|有此元素的替换不受限制。There are no restrictions on replacements of this element.| |`Substitution`|此元素不能被替换为通过替换派生类型。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Substitution.| |`Extension`|此元素不能被替换为通过扩展派生类型。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| |`Restriction`|此元素不能被替换为通过限制派生类型。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| |`All`|`#all`。`#all`. 此元素不能被替换为任何类型而不考虑派生方法。This element cannot be replaced by any type regardless of derivation method.|

span.span: Gets the collection of constraints on the element.
The collection of constraints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回在元素上的约束的集合。Returns a collection of constraints on the element. 可以是任意`XmlSchemaKey`， `XmlSchemaKeyref`，或`XmlSchemaUnique`。Can be any of `XmlSchemaKey`, `XmlSchemaKeyref`, or `XmlSchemaUnique`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `fixed`和`default`特性是互相排斥。The `fixed` and `default` attributes are mutually exclusive. 如果元素包含简单类型，则该值必须是该类型的有效值。If the element contains a simple type, this value must be a valid value of that type.

The post-compilation value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该对象可以是如果元素具有内置的 XML 架构类型或如果元素具有的用户定义的类型。The object can be if the element has a built-in XML Schema type or if the element has a user-defined type. 此属性是架构验证后信息集属性。This property is a post-schema-validation infoset property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 属性在.NET Framework 2.0 版中已过时，已被替换为属性。The property is obsolete in the 2.0 version of the .NET Framework and has been replaced by the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置 属性以指示不允许进一步派生。

span.span: Gets or sets the property to indicate that no further derivations are allowed.
The property.
The default is .
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以包含下表中显示的值。This attribute can contain the values shown in the following table. |EnumEnum|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`None`|使用定义的派生限制`FinalDefault`架构，如果它存在的属性。Use the derivation restriction defined by the `FinalDefault` property of the schema, if it exists.| |`Empty`|有此元素的派生没有限制。There are no restrictions on derivations of this element.| |`Extension`|此元素不能通过扩展派生。This element cannot be derived by Extension.| |`Restriction`|此元素不能由限制派生。This element cannot be derived by Restriction.| |`All`|`#all`。`#all`. 此元素不能通过任何派生方法派生。This element cannot be derived by any derivation method.| 另请参见。See also . `Substitution``List`，和`Union`派生方法不允许用于此属性。`Substitution`, `List`, and `Union` derivation methods are not allowed for this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为的值`elementFormDefault`属性`schema`元素包含的元素。The default value is the value of the `elementFormDefault` attribute for the `schema` element containing the element. 默认值为 `Unqualified`。The default is `Unqualified`. |EnumEnum|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`Qualified`|必须用命名空间前缀限定元素。Element must be qualified with the namespace prefix.| |`Unqualified`|元素不需要用命名空间前缀限定。Element is not required to be qualified with the namespace prefix.| 无法设置值，如果包含元素是`schema`元素。The value cannot be set if the containing element is the `schema` element.

summary.span: 获取或设置元素的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the element.
The name of the element.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) XML 命名空间规范中定义，该名称必须是 NCName （无冒号名称）。The name must be an NCName (no-colon name) as defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Namespaces specification. `Name` 和`RefName`特性是互相排斥。`Name` and `RefName` attributes are mutually exclusive.

span.span: Gets the actual qualified name for the given element.
The qualified name of the element.
The post-compilation value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的名称，`ref`属性引用。 is the name that a `ref` attribute refers to. 限定的名称包含的元素的 NCName。The qualified name consists of the NCName of the element. 例如，元素名称 ="NCName"和前缀用来描述`targetNamespace`的架构。For example, element name = "NCName", and the prefix used to describe the `targetNamespace` of the schema. 此属性包含的编译后值`QualifiedName`属性。This property holds the post-compilation value of the `QualifiedName` property.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置在该架构（或指定的命名空间指示的另一个架构）中声明的元素的引用名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the reference name of an element declared in this schema (or another schema indicated by the specified namespace).
The reference name of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `RefName`必须是 QName。The `RefName` must be a QName. `RefName`可以包含命名空间前缀。The `RefName` can include a namespace prefix. 如果`RefName`属性是存在，所有`complexType`， `simpleType`， `key`， `keyref`， `unique`， `nillable`， `default`， `fixed`， `form`， `block`，和`type`必须是不存在。If `RefName` attribute is present, all `complexType`, `simpleType`, `key`, `keyref`, `unique`, `nillable`, `default`, `fixed`, `form`, `block`, and `type` must be absent. 如果`RefName`存在，则`minOccurs`， `maxOccurs`，和`id`允许。If `RefName` is present, `minOccurs`, `maxOccurs`, and `id` are allowed. 若要声明使用现有元素定义的元素，请使用`RefName`属性指定现有元素定义。To declare an element using an existing element definition, use the `RefName` attribute to specify the existing element definition. 无法设置值，如果包含元素是`schema`元素。The value cannot be set if the containing element is the `schema` element.

summary.span: 获取或设置元素类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of the element.

summary.span: 这可以是复杂类型，也可以是简单类型。

span.span: This can either be a complex type or a simple type.
The type of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用的现有声明一个元素`simpleType`或`complexType`定义，但使用`SchemaType`属性指定现有的类型。To declare an element using an existing `simpleType` or `complexType` definition, use the `SchemaType` property to specify the existing type. 如果`RefName`属性，则`complexType`， `simpleType`， `key`， `keyref`，并且`unique`元素和`nillable`， `default`， `fixed`， `form`， `block`，和`SchemaType`属性不能同时存在。If `RefName` attribute is present, `complexType`, `simpleType`, `key`, `keyref`, and `unique` elements and `nillable`, `default`, `fixed`, `form`, `block`, and `SchemaType` attributes cannot be present.

summary.span: 获取或设置由该元素替换的元素的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of an element that is being substituted by this element.

value.span: 由该元素替换的元素的限定名称。

span.span: The qualified name of an element that is being substituted by this element.
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该元素必须具有相同的类型或从指定元素类型派生的类型。This element must have the same type or a type derived from the type of the specified element. 该值必须是 QName。This value must be a QName. 无法设置值，如果包含元素是`schema`元素。The value cannot be set if the containing element is the `schema` element.
